name: WatriX
description:
INNOVATIVE and UNIQUE!

WatriX brings an exciting little game to your Apple Watch, which makes you experience how it is to play a game on your wrist! While blocks are falling down in a Matrix, you tap the arrow keys to move and rotate the blocks. Tap the downward arrow (▼) to drop a block. For each completed line, you receive one point.

Choose out of three levels to match your expertise, and post your scores on GameCenter!

FEATURES:
- Simple and user friendly interface
- innovate, creative and unique way to use your Apple Watch: your friends will be amazed
- Level selection
- Submit scores to GameCenter

IMPORTANT
This is NOT Tetris. Please don't confuse this game with Tetris. This game uses different figures and has a differently sized board. If you are looking for Tetris, please download the official Tetris app.
